page.title: 03Old & New Houses in Holwell
page.content: A 200 year old cottage stands beside a new detached house. The former has one cold water tap, outdoor lavatory, electric light, and no bath. It is heated by an open fire.{The house}has three lavatories, bath, shower and numerous power points, used for auto- matic washing machine, dishwasher, tumble drier, refrigerator, freezer, toaster, iron, food-mixer, microwave oven, television and radio. Constant hot water and central heating is by an oil fired boiler in addition to an open fireplace. The house also has double garage and electric meter on outside wall. It is built with modern materials for easy maintenance. {The cottage}has no damp course and old uneven walls. Both homes meet the needs of their occupants. Will the house withstand time as well as the cottage has done?
